mapper.insert: insert into orderlist (o_id, o_type, o_number, o_name, o_weight, o_sender, o_start, o_destination, o_status, senderphone, consignee, consigneephone, startcity, midpointcity, destinationcity, transportprice, distributionprice, carriageprice, totalprice, car, o_remark ) values (#{oId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oSender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oDestination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{senderphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consigneephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midpointcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destinationcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{distributionprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{carriageprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{car,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update orderlist set o_type = #{oType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, o_number = #{oNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_name = #{oName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_weight = #{oWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, o_sender = #{oSender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_start = #{oStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_destination = #{oDestination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_status = #{oStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, senderphone = #{senderphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consignee = #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consigneephone = #{consigneephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startcity = #{startcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midpointcity = #{midpointcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, destinationcity = #{destinationcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transportprice = #{transportprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, distributionprice = #{distributionprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, carriageprice = #{carriageprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, totalprice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car = #{car,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_remark = #{oRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where o_id = #{oId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select o_id, o_type, o_number, o_name, o_weight, o_sender, o_start, o_destination, o_status, senderphone, consignee, consigneephone, startcity, midpointcity, destinationcity, transportprice, distributionprice, carriageprice, totalprice, car, o_remark from orderlist where o_id = #{oId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
